title: Dodging games in champ select
body:
I was just wondering if everyone is happy with the way it's dealt with right now. 

I for one am a but peeved about it's ease to punish you for dodging a queue. I'm not one to dodge a queue very often at all, in fact I'm the guy who never calls a specific role, I always call "fill". But when a team, even in draft pick can't sort itself out and I can tell I'm going to be having a less that enjoyable experience for the next 20 or so minutes I at least want to have some kind of leeway in deciding my participation for such an activity.

What I'm getting at is that I think it would be a good idea to give out a single dodge a day that can go unpunished (without the six minute bar from playing a game). 

I'm probably just being a pissy nerd, but eh, it grinds my gears and I have nothing to do for the next 3 and a half minutes. Discuss.

replies.body: If there's no dodge penalty you'll be matched with the same team and have to dodge again...
That could be fixed by completely removing you from queue so you have to manually reenter your desired queue type again.

you know that 10 seconds you have between someone dodging and getting another queue?

Yeah i can re-queue in that time.

No need or sass mate.

Wait 5 more seconds, it'll make the world of difference.
My point is, the person who dodges has requeued and due to the way matchmaking works, will be put with the same people they just dodged from.
Even then there's still a chance to be matched with the same people. It doesn't fix the problem.

I agree.
it would be nice for the system to install just a little bit of trust.
although on the other hand it would also be nice to include this function for in-game disconnection.
and I mean the person would have 3 times they could disconnect and reconnect and not get punished,
with the condition they reconnect within the next (X) amount of minutes/seconds.

what do you think?

The connection in x time thing is a great idea, except it could be abused by trolls

That is the problem with having such a popular game. No matter how many good and rightful players there are, there is always  a bunch of trolls in the demographic somewhere. any trust or leeway that is given out by Riot has the potential to be abused by a lot of trolls and toxic players.
